homeSection.title: From Concept to Code.
homeSection.description: I enjoy turning ideas into reality by engaging in every layer of a project, from building solid logic, designing intuitive interfaces, to managing data in an organized manner. I believe a great application is a blend of powerful functionality and seamless user experience.

c.message: Learning C language provided a strong foundation for understanding basic programming logic and data structures. Although it was quite challenging at first, I feel satisfied as it now makes it easier to learn other languages.

sql.message: With SQL, I learned how to efficiently manage and retrieve data from databases. This experience has been very useful for backend projects I developed.

html.message: HTML was my introduction to the web world. Through HTML, I learned how to structure pages neatly and semantically.

css.message: CSS helps me enhance the appearance of web pages and make them more visually appealing.

js.message: JavaScript introduced me to creating dynamic interactions on web pages, making applications more lively and interactive.

java.message: Java provided a deep understanding of OOP concepts such as inheritance, polymorphism, and encapsulation. I now feel more confident creating object-oriented applications.

php.message: Through PHP, I gained an understanding of backend web development, including data management and database integration, by building projects with HTML-based interfaces connected to a database.

cpp.message: Studied C++ from the ground up — beginning with fundamental algorithms and progressing to advanced OOP — which strengthened my overall programming skills.

react.message: React introduced me to component-based architecture and state management. I enjoy how React makes UI development more structured and efficient.

tailwind.message: Tailwind makes it easy for me to create responsive and consistent web designs without having to write a lot of CSS manually.

c.title: C Language | Nail Art Ayunda
c.desc: A simple cashier program based on C running on CMD, displaying nail art service lists, processing payments, and automatically printing transaction receipts.

java1.title: Java Fundamental | PureFresh Laundry
java1.desc: A web application with CRUD features using Java, Spring Boot, and Thymeleaf for user data management.

html.title: Html + Css + JavaScript | Elysian Gamer
html.desc: A web project providing a collection of free online games with attractive graphics, fun gameplay, and easy browser access without cost.

java2.title: Java API | HayMart REST APIs
java2.desc: HayMart is a Java REST API for managing sales, product inventory, and generating sales reports, built with Spring Boot and MySQL.

php.title: Php | Koperasi simpan pinjam
php.desc: Web application built with PHP and MySQL to manage a cooperative's operations, including admin, members, savings, loans, and installments.

react.title: React | Skintizen
react.desc: A front-end application where users can browse and order Skintific products. Built with React and Tailwind CSS, with data stored in local storage.

profile.title: Profile
profile.desc: An Associate Degree student in Informatics Management with skills in Java programming, covering OOP implementation, REST API development, and application building using Spring Boot. Experienced with SQL for database management and web development using JavaScript, React.js, Tailwind, and HTML on the frontend. Basic understanding of C programming for logic, and experience as a Teaching Assistant supporting academic activities.

experience.desc: Supporting academic and teaching activities, including assisting in preparing materials and ensuring smooth lectures.
